text:
@MurielBowser Wearing a mask is not politics but public health. Mandatory masks/social distancing is well documented to slow the rates of #COVID19 infection

To not wear a mask is illogical for those so anxious to 're-open.' Early 'reopening' states to include TX, FL, AZ are now COVID surging
